unnormalised: Infosys announced the launch of its new AI-powered software development platform, "DevAI," at 10:00 AM today. The platform aims to reduce coding time by 40% and improve code quality by 25%, according to Mr. Ravi Kumar, the company's CTO.
normalised: Infosys announced the launch of its new A-I-powered software development platform, "DevA-I," at ten A-M today. The platform aims to reduce coding time by forty percent and improve code quality by twenty five percent, according to Mister Ravi Kumar, the company's C-T-O.

unnormalised: DevAI integrates with popular IDEs like VS Code and IntelliJ, supporting languages such as Python, Java, and C++.
